answerText: All the Pretty Horses[10] Another work about horses is this 1973 play by Peter Shaffer is about Martin Dysart's attempts to cure Alan Strang of his obsession with horses.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 3 | 9 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Along with The Crossing and Cities of the Plain, it makes up its author's Border Trilogy. For 10 points each: [10] Name this book which revolves around the travels and adventures of Lacey Rawlins and John Grady Cole, the latter of whom proposes to Alejandra, whose father betrays them to the authorities.
